column1:
['
IX. 계열회사 등에 관한 사항
가. 계열회사 명칭당사는 2021년 03월 31일 현재 당사를 제외하고 48개의 계열회사를 소유하고있습니다. 현재 계열회사는 모두 비상장 회사이며, 회사의 약칭 및 명칭은 아래와 같습니다.1. Hanon Beijing: Hanon Systems (Beijing) Co., Ltd.
2. Hanon Dalian: Hanon Systems (Dalian) Co., Ltd.
3. Hanon Shanghai: Hanon Systems (Shanghai) Co., Ltd.
4. Hanon Chongqing: Hanon Systems (Chongqing) Co., Ltd.
5. Hanon Nanchang: Hanon Systems (Nanchang) Co., Ltd.6. Hanon Nanjing: Hanon Jie Xi Si Systems (Nanjing) Co., Ltd.7. Hanon Yancheng: Hanon Systems (Yancheng) Co., Ltd.8. Hanon New Chongqing: Chongqing Hanon Systems Co., Ltd9. CSG JV: Chongqing Hanon Jianshe Automotive Thermal Systems Co. Ltd10. FHAC JV: FAWER Hanon Automotive Components (Changchun) \xa0 \xa0\xa0 Company\xa0 Ltd. 11. HASI : Hanon Automotive Systems India Private Ltd.
12. Hanon Bhiwadi: Hanon Climate Systems India Private Limited
13. Hanon Japan: Hanon Systems Japan Ltd.
14. Hanon Thailand: Hanon Systems (Thailand) Co. Ltd.
15. Hanon Slovakia: Hanon Systems Slovakia s.r.o.
16. Hanon Turkey:Hanon Automotive Climate Sys. Manufacturing Industrial and \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0\xa0 Commercial Co.
17.\xa0Hanon Portugal: Hanon Systems Portugal, S.A.
18. Hanon Autopal Service: Hanon Systems Autopal Services, s.r.o.
19. Hanon Autopal: Hanon Systems Autopal, s.r.o.
20. Hanon Charleville: Hanon Systems Charleville SAS
21. Hanon Hungary: Hanon Systems Hungary Kft
22. Hanon UK: Hanon Systems UK Limited
23. Hanon Deutschland: Hanon Systems Deutschland GmbH
24.Hanon Netherlands: Hanon Systems Netherlands Cooperatief U.A.
25.\xa0Hanon Russia: Hanon Systems Rus. LLC
26. Hanon Alabama: Hanon Systems Alabama Corp.
27. Hanon USA: Hanon Systems USA, LLC
28. Hanon Canada: Hanon Systems Canada Inc.
29.\xa0Hanon Coclisa:\xa0Coclisa, S.A. de C.V.
30. Hanon Mexicana: Climate Systems Mexicana, S.A. de C.V.
31. Hanon Brazil: Hanon Systems Climatizacoes do Brasil Industria e Comercio \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ltda.32. Hanon South Africa: Hanon Systems South Africa(PTY) Ltd33. Bonaire: Bonaire Automotive Electrical System Co., Ltd
34. FHTS: FAWER Hanon Thermal Systems (Changchun) Company Ltd.
35. JCS: Japan Climate Systems Corporation36.\xa0BBHS: Beijing BHAP Hanon Systems Co., Ltd.37. Hanon Auto Parts Hungary:\xa0 Gibbs-Hungary Die Casting Ipari Termelo Kft.
38.\xa0Hanon EFP Corporation:\xa0Hanon Systems EFP Corporation
39.\xa0Hanon EFP Deutschland GmbH:\xa0Hanon Systems EFP Deutschland GmbH*40.\xa0Hanon EFP Mexico:\xa0EFP Operations Mexicana, S.A. de C.V.*
41.\xa0Hanon EFP Mexico Service:\xa0\xa0Climate Systems Services Mexicana EFP, S.A.\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 de C.V.*
42.\xa0Hanon EFP Korea: Hanon Systems EFP Korea Inc.*43.\xa0Hanon EFP Italia Benevento:\xa0Hanon Systems Italia Benevento*44.\xa0Hanon EFP Italia Campiglione:\xa0Hanon Systems Italia Campiglione*45.\xa0Hanon EFP Plovdiv EOOD:\xa0Hanon Systems Plovdiv EOOD\xa0**46.\xa0Hanon EFP Canada:\xa0Hanon Systems EFP Canada Ltd.\xa0*47.\xa0Hanon EFP Changzhou:\xa0Hanon Systems EFP (Changzhou) Co., Ltd.*48.\xa0Hanon Thermal Technology :\xa0Hanon Systems Thermal Technology s.r.o.\xa0→ Hanon New Chongqing은 Hanon Beijing이 83.25% 소유하고 있습니다.→ 계열회사 명칭 옆에 * 표시된 회사는 Hanon Systems EFP Corporation이 \xa0 \xa0 100% 소유하고 있습니다.→ 계열회사 명칭 옆에 ** 표시된 회사는 Hanon Systems EFP Deutschland GmbH\xa0 \xa0 \xa0\xa0 이 100% 소유하고 있습니다.
나. 계열회사간\xa0계통도
계열회사 등의 상호지분 현황
